name: DynaMine
description:
You are a miner that got stuck in the cave after the elevator broke. Your eyes connected with a minecart filled to the brim with dynamite with which you now try to escape your demise. Using your broken revolver to set off the dynamite mid air and other shananigansWill you get out.....probably not, but who knows?

!Trigger warning!

!NO GAME SAVE!

!Flash warning!
